testcase.name: check the service PUT (UpdatePet) To see if status code is 200.

failure.message: put.feature:16 - status code was: 500, expected: 200, response time: 378, url: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet, response: {"code":500,"type":"unknown","message":"something bad happened"}
